title: Transformed Into a Hucow… for Science!: A Lesbian Breast Expansion and Hucow Transformation Fantasy
description: Cecilé is a sexy business manager for the chemical research and development branch of a huge company. Joan, Cecilé's lead researcher and eye candy, has just made a major breakthrough on a product meant for cows. But before Joan can tell her boss the exciting news, Cecilé unintentionally makes herself the first test subject! What happens next will expand her horizons beyond anything she could ever have imagined. But not as much as Joan's world will expand after she decides to partake in the experiment!
author: Beatrice Evenmorne
